item.title: Go coverage for external tests with Cobra
item.description: Prerequisite reading: Go coverage with external tests Go coverage can be generated by a CLI tool by compiling it as a test binary and passing it the test coverage flags. There’s one catch: coverage will not be generated if the program does not exit with status 0, so its not possible to get coverage for tests of failure cases. Instructions for generating coverage in this way are described in Go coverage with external tests and won’t be repeated here.
